summary: Replaces the Steel Arrow mesh with the Nord Hero Arrow mesh, and retexures it slightly.
descriptionHtml:
I feel like the Steel Arrows are a bit out of place in Skyrim, and that they are very visually abrasive, with their red fletching and cylindrical quiver. So! I did this!

This replaces the Steel Arrow mesh with the Nord Hero Arrow mesh, and retexures it very slightly to tone down the reddish tint on the vanilla Nord arrows.

In my opinion, this configuration matches the Steel Armor set much more, and looks more appropriate being totted around by guards and the like. :)
author: Kyim
